author: lukas-mu
body:
According to the documentation [About Object Creation > Create non-custom objects from hash tables](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/powershell/module/microsoft.powershell.core/about/about_object_creation?view=powershell-7#create-non-custom-objects-from-hash-tables) it should be possible to **cast a hash table to a type** (that meets the corresponding requirements) in order to **create a new instance** of that type.

## Steps to reproduce
Code example from the aforementioned documentation page:
```powershell
[System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo]@{
	CreateNoWindow = "$true"
	Verb           = "run as"
}
```

## Expected behavior

Successful object creation.

## Actual behavior

Error:
```none
InvalidArgument: Cannot create object of type "System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo". The ArgumentsCreateNoWindow property was not found for the System.Diagnostics.ProcessStartInfo object. The available property is: [Arguments <System.String>] , [ArgumentList <System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1[[System.String, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]]>] , [CreateNoWindow <System.Boolean>] , [EnvironmentVariables <System.Collections.Specialized.StringDictionary>] , [Environment <System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary`2[[System.String, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e],[System.String, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=5.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e]]>] , [RedirectStandardInput <System.Boolean>] , [RedirectStandardOutput <System.Boolean>] , [RedirectStandardError <System.Boolean>] , [StandardInputEncoding <System.Text.Encoding>] , [StandardErrorEncoding <System.Text.Encoding>] , [StandardOutputEncoding <System.Text.Encoding>] , [FileName <System.String>] , [WorkingDirectory <System.String>] , [ErrorDialog <System.Boolean>] , [ErrorDialogParentHandle <System.IntPtr>] , [UserName <System.String>] , [Verb <System.String>] , [WindowStyle <System.Diagnostics.ProcessWindowStyle>] , [PasswordInClearText <System.String>] , [Domain <System.String>] , [LoadUserProfile <System.Boolean>] , [Password <System.Security.SecureString>] , [Verbs <System.String[]>] , [UseShellExecute <System.Boolean>]
```

## Environment data

```none
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      7.1.0-rc.1
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    7.1.0-rc.1
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.19041
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0…}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
The example woks with "CreateNoWindow" but returns the error for "ArgumentsCreateNoWindow". You could open new issue in https://github.com/MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs repository.
GitHub
MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs
The official PowerShell documentation sources. Contribute to MicrosoftDocs/PowerShell-Docs development by creating an account on GitHub.

comments.author: lukas-mu
comments.body:
I am sorry, I messed up. Everything works as expected.

Another application interfered when pasting the code snippets into the VSCode console and Windows Terminal, which resulted in consistent error messages across all testes PowerShell versions.

title: Creating a non-custom object from a hash tables fails with 'InvalidArgument'
